text:
Hello team, hope all is well :sparkles:
Does the marketplace public app name & logo overwrite the app itself? If they are different, which will appear in the integrations tab once installed? I'm currently drafting an app listing and the app details are locked. Thank you
Yes they do, once you have a listing it's all managed from there!
Perfect! Thanks <@U044BTK3EGP> for your quick reply :raised_hands::skin-tone-4:
